meanings.definition: To repeat or copy something exactly.
meanings.sent1: She kept dittoing my answers during the test.
meanings.sent2: He was dittoing the dance moves from the video.
meanings.sent3: The parrot was dittoing everything the teacher said.
meanings.sent4: Her actions were dittoing those of her role model.
meanings.sent5: The machine was dittoing the same pattern over and over.

meanings.definition: The act of duplicating or imitating something.
meanings.sent1: His dittoing of the painting was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The dittoing of fashion trends is common in the industry.
meanings.sent3: The dittoing of his jokes always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The dittoing of nature in her artwork was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The dittoing of his speech patterns was uncanny.
